text: geudaega eoneu gos-eulo yeohaeng-eulhadeon geudaeui eolgul-eul halamsawon-eulo dollil geos-imyeo neohoega eodie issdeon eolgul-eul geu jjog-eulo hyanghaljini ag-eul jihyanghaneunja oeeneun amudo iuileul je-uichi anh-eul geos-ila geudaeneun geudeul eul dulyeowo malmyeo naman-eul gong-gyeonghala geulihamyeon naui eunhyega neohoe wie chungmanke hayeo olh-eun gillo indodoege halila
